title.title: BALI RAFTING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI HORSE RIDING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI HORSE RIDING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI HORSE RIDING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS GREAT CHOICES FOR DO THE HORSE BACK RIDING AND THEN RIDE AN ELEPHANT
tagline.text: BALI HORSE RIDING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS GREAT CHOICES FOR DO THE HORSE BACK RIDING AND THEN RIDE AN ELEPHANT
tagline.html: BALI HORSE RIDING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS GREAT CHOICES FOR DO THE HORSE BACK RIDING AND THEN RIDE AN ELEPHANT

description.text: Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages is the best choices for those like to do the Horse Riding tour and then do the Elephant Ride for 30 minutes in one day. Never missed the excitement double packages we offer to make your holiday more enjoyable. This tour packages will give you opportunity to ride two amazing animal in Bali islands. First we will ride the horse riding for 1 hours 30 Minutes in Serangan Beach and see the fascinating sceneret during the ride, the horse riding guide will lead the way to the wonderful experience. After finish the horse riding we will directly to the elephant parks for enjoy the 30 minutes riding an elephants passed the jungle and village. You will be like a king by sitting on a teak chair in the top of the elephants. After ride the elephant you will enjoy the delicous lunch with Indonesian food. It will be impressive experience in one day by riding two amazing animal horse and elephants. This Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour more enjoyable with private car and the excellent English Speaking Driver during the trip.

title.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Horse Riding Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. This adventure will give you an rare experience by allowed you to explore the hidden beauty of this islands by riding horse with our professional horseback riding guide. You will see the beauty of the beach from the top of a horse and passed the local village to see the social activities life. The sounds of horses hooves echoing through the crashing waves of the beach and take a unique look at Balinese life as you pass the local village. Is amazing experience you will remember for all your life.
description.html: Bali Horse Riding Tour packages is the best option for those want to riding an horse in Bali islands. Is amazing experience you will remember for all your life.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elphant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant or 30 minutes ride and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

button.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

price.title: Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,850,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,600,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,450,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,400,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,350,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking
  • Maximum weight for horse riding is 90kg

Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • 1 Hours horse riding
  • 30 minutes Elephant Ride
  • Professional Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Guide
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Horse Riding and Elephant Ride Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Horse Riding Finish and continue the tour

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
